identity.mission: Create a high-converting, life-saving interface that prioritizes speed and clarity.

heading_styles.h1: text-5xl md:text-7xl font-bold tracking-tight uppercase leading-none
heading_styles.h2: text-4xl md:text-5xl font-bold tracking-tight uppercase text-slate-900

typography.instructions: Import 'Oswald' (weights 400, 500, 700) and 'Plus Jakarta Sans' (weights 400, 500, 600, 700) from Google Fonts in index.css.

usage.cta_secondary: bg-white border-2 border-slate-200 hover:border-blue-600 text-slate-900 hover:text-blue-700
usage.surface_card: bg-white border border-slate-100 shadow-sm hover:shadow-md transition-all duration-300

buttons.default: h-12 px-8 rounded-full font-bold uppercase tracking-wide transition-all active:scale-95
buttons.emergency: animate-pulse bg-red-600 text-white hover:bg-red-700 h-14 px-10 rounded-full text-lg shadow-xl shadow-red-500/30 ring-4 ring-red-100

cards.service_card: group relative overflow-hidden rounded-2xl bg-white p-8 border border-slate-100 shadow-sm hover:shadow-xl transition-all duration-300 hover:-translate-y-1

navigation.sticky_header: sticky top-0 z-50 w-full border-b border-slate-100 bg-white/80 backdrop-blur-xl supports-[backdrop-filter]:bg-white/80
navigation.floating_fab: fixed bottom-6 right-6 z-50 flex flex-col gap-4

motion.marquee: Use react-fast-marquee for 'Hospitals We Serve' or 'Coverage Areas'

assets.icons: Use lucide-react (e.g., Phone, MapPin, Clock, Siren, HeartPulse, ShieldCheck)

accessibility.contrast: Ensure 4.5:1 contrast ratio for all text. Use white text only on dark red/blue backgrounds.
accessibility.aria: All buttons must have aria-label. Images must have alt text describing the medical context.
accessibility.reduced_motion: Disable animations if prefers-reduced-motion is true.

instructions_to_main_agent: INSTALL: npm install framer-motion lucide-react react-fast-marquee clsx tailwind-merge
SETUP: Add 'Oswald' and 'Plus Jakarta Sans' to index.css via @import or <link>.
LAYOUT: Use a Sticky Header with a prominent 'Call Now' button visible at all times.
HERO: Use the 'ambulance_exterior' or 'hero_bg' image with a dark overlay and high-contrast white text. The 'Emergency Call' button must be the most visible element.
SERVICES: Use a Bento Grid layout. Make cards clickable.
CONTACT: Add a Floating Action Button (FAB) at the bottom-right for WhatsApp and Call.
SEO: Add Schema.org 'EmergencyService' JSON-LD to the head.
TESTING: Add data-testid to all CTA buttons (e.g., 'hero-call-btn', 'whatsapp-fab').

UNIVERSAL_GUIDELINES.export_convention: Named exports for components, Default exports for pages.
